text:
I’ve the same issue too, the priority is on the page created whatever changes I made in template, if I want to see changes I always have to delete the created page and re create it again.

For example (and that happens a lot)  If client wants to modify a little thing in his template I’m forced to tell him that he has to recreate totally his page, that’s not convenient at all to them. Thank you
Dont want to specially override HubSpot styles but  ID must be unique on a page so if I want to use many modules with this ID it wouldn’t be good.

Two questions in one here ... Is there a way to change column margins at all in the drag and drop page editor? Could some kind of field be added and be applied on a section by section basis? I want to achieve a two column design with the corners touching, and then flip layout on mobile to maintain the alternating images in columns.
yes i think we should be able to apply a variable to the sections.
i know this would be fixed and not flexible
but in the case of 2 modules where one has it, the other does not, we could use this technique
